st:Description.name: DMUOverlay
st:Description.st:role: Setting to handle the DMU Security Overlay parameters

st:attribute.Name: ActiveState
st:attribute.st:role: Global activation state of the Security Overlay

st:attribute.Name: Type
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: The Security Overlay can be either a static text or a dynamic text computed with a defined Product Structure attribute

st:enum.st:role: Computed Security overlay text, based on Product Structure scan

st:attribute.Name: Text_Static
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: value of the text displayed in case the Security Overlay Type is CatOverlayStaticText

st:default.st:role: if default value is '${Default_OverlayText}', the text value is computed from an internationalization file

st:attribute.Name: Text_Mapping
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: value of the text displayed in case the Security Overlay Type is CatOverlayMapping

st:default.st:role: if default value is '[PARAMETER_OUT]', the text value is computed from a Product Structure and an xml mapping file

st:attribute.Name: MappingFile
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Xml Mapping file used to compute text in case Security Overlay Type is CatOverlayMapping

st:attribute.Name: FillColor
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Color used to fill the Security Overlay text box displayed

st:default.st:role: RGB values. Value should be in [0..255]. If Red value is 256, no fill color is assumed

st:attribute.Name: TextColor
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Color used to display the Security Overlay text

st:default.st:role: RGB values. Value should be in [0..255]

st:attribute.Name: TextSize
st:attribute.st:role: Default size value for Security Overlay Text

st:enum.st:role: Security Overlay is displayed on top of the screen
Security Overlay is displayed on bottom of the screen
Security Overlay is displayed on left of the screen
Security Overlay is displayed on right of the screen
Security Overlay is displayed in diagonal

st:attribute.Name: TileMode
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Depending of TileMode value, the security overlay text is tiled or not on the screen
